newsitem.title: CYPRUS: Man seriously injured in Cyprus bomb blast.
newsitem.headline: Man seriously injured in Cyprus bomb blast.

text.p: A man was seriously injured on Tuesday when a bomb exploded outside a building in the southern Cypriot town of Limassol in what police believe is a continuing gang war.
The attack on Charalambos Onisiforou Charalambous, 30, was the latest in a series that police said is part of a struggle between gangs to control the entertainment and vice business.

Charalambous was acquitted earlier this year of attempting to plant explosives outside a pool hall belonging to a gambling club owner. His father was gunned down on the steps of a Limassol gambling club late last year by unknown assailants.
